item.title: In Pursuit of Messi: How a Kerala Woman Learnt Spanish, Moved to Spain for Leo
item.description: In Pursuit of Messi: How a Kerala Woman Learnt Spanish, Moved to Spain for Leo In a case of football transcending nationality, Jushna Shahin from Kerala has learnt Spanish to speak to Messi.

item.title: FIFA WC 2022 Analysis | Brazil’s Rizarlison scored a ‘magical’ goal – even though Serbia lost!

item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo fined, suspended for two games for incident with fan at Goodison Park
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo fined, suspended for two games for incident with fan at Goodison Park The 37-year-old is a free agent now after Manchester United announced his release from the contract on Tuesday.
